Flame Helmet

helmet (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 177
armor id [armor]: 80 (Flame Helmet)
protection, body [protbody]: 5
protection, head [prothead]: 26
magic bonus [boosters]: +F
reinvigoration [reinvigoration]: -3

Requires 25F to forge (F4)

Flames will start to burn on top of this helmet as soon as it is worn. The flames are a visible manifestation of the wearer's life force and will enhance his power in Fire magic and protect him from heat. Wearing this helmet in combat is quite strenuous, but the protection gained is formidable.
